subject: Entrepreneurship
title: Phil Knight: Running Nike Into Existence
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Phil Knight: Running Nike Into Existence.

hook.text: Phil Knight sold Japanese running shoes out of his car trunk at track meets. That was Nike's first store.

buildup.text: Knight and his coach Bill Bowerman believed American runners deserved better, cheaper shoes.
